mapper.sql: fid, ftradeid, fentrusttype, fentrustid, fmatchid, famount, fprize, fcount , fisactive, flastupdattime, fcreatetime, version
mapper.select: select from f_entrust_log where ftradeid = #{ftradeid} and date_format(fcreatetime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") >= date_format(#{time}, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") and fisactive = 1;
select from f_entrust_log where ftradeid = #{ftradeid} and fisactive = 1 order by fcreatetime desc limit 0,#{max};

select sum(fcount), max(fprize), min(fprize) from f_entrust_log where ftradeid = #{ftradeid} and date_format(fcreatetime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") >= date_format(#{time}, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") and fisactive = 1;
select from f_entrust_log where ftradeid = #{ftradeid} order by fcreatetime desc limit 0,1;
